title: Tzipi Livni
summary: Tziporah Malka "Tzipi" Livni (Hebrew: ציפי (ציפורה) מלכה לבני‎, pronounced [tsipoˈʁa malˈka tsipi livni]; born 8 July 1958) is an Israeli politician, diplomat, and lawyer. A former member of the Knesset and leader in the center-left political camp, Livni is a former Foreign Minister of Israel, Vice Prime Minister, Minister of Justice, and Leader of the Opposition. She is known for her efforts to resolve the Israeli–Palestinian conflict.
